title: How to Make Spicy Beans and Rice

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Pour water in a large saucepan and allow it to boil.
Add the rice and mix with a wooden spoon.
Reduce the heat and allow the rice to cook for about 40 minutes with a lid on top.
Add the beans on a casserole baking dish.
Add the cumin, chili powder, jalapeño, and black pepper.
Bake the beans mixture in the oven for about 30 minutes.
Sprinkle the olives, green onions, and cheese on top of the beans mixture.
Allow the beans to bake for an additional five to ten minutes, until the cheese melts and the beans are slightly crisped.
Remove the beans from the oven and allow it cool to for about ten minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Scoop the cooked rice in a serving plate and add the spicy beans on top. Enjoy!

text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).  Pour water in a large saucepan and allow it to boil.  Add the rice and mix with a wooden spoon.  Reduce the heat and allow the rice to cook for about 40 minutes with a lid on top.  Add the beans on a casserole baking dish.  Add the cumin, chili powder, jalapeño, and black pepper. Stir with a wooden spoon. Bake the beans mixture in the oven for about 30 minutes.  Sprinkle the olives, green onions, and cheese on top of the beans mixture.  Allow the beans to bake for an additional five to ten minutes, until the cheese melts and the beans are slightly crisped.  Remove the beans from the oven and allow it cool to for about ten minutes.  Serve. Scoop the cooked rice in a serving plate and add the spicy beans on top. Enjoy!
